summary: This document is an internal email discussing the clearance of RDC alerts related to Jeffrey Edward Epstein. It mentions previous reviews and clearances for Epstein's financial activities and includes communication between compliance officers regarding the matter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the subject of RDC alerts related to his financial activities, which have been reviewed multiple times.

persons.name: Velmir Vejzovic
persons.context: Vejzovic is the sender of the email and discusses the clearance of alerts related to Epstein.

persons.name: Alka Babu
persons.context: Babu is the recipient of the email and is instructed to attach documents related to Epstein's KYC.

persons.name: Mamta-A Choudhary
persons.context: Choudhary is mentioned as the sender of a previous email regarding the alerts.

connections.description: Vejzovic, as an AML Compliance Officer, communicates with Babu regarding compliance matters.
Vejzovic reviews alerts related to Epstein's financial activities.

events.title: RDC Alert Generated
events.description: An RDC alert was generated for Jeffrey Edward Epstein regarding his financial activities.

events.title: Previous Clearance
events.description: A previous clearance for Epstein's financial activities was provided.

events.title: Previous Clearance
events.description: Another clearance for Epstein's financial activities was provided.

locations: 5201 Gate Parkway, 2nd floor, Jacksonville, Florida, 32256, USA
keyFacts: The document discusses the clearance of RDC alerts related to Jeffrey Edward Epstein.
Velmir Vejzovic is the AML Compliance Officer who reviewed the alerts.
Previous clearances for Epstein's financial activities were provided in 2013 and 2016.
The email is part of internal compliance communications regarding Epstein's KYC.
